CHANNEL_TITLE = #channelTitle#,
CHANNEL_URL = #channelUrl#,
UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#

CHANNEL_URL = #channelUrl#

SELECT /* [Channel_SqlMap.xml] selectAll */ * FROM ( SELECT AA.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER ASC) AS RNUM, A.CHANNEL_ID, B.CATEGORY_ID, B.CATEGORY_NAME, A.OWNER_ID, A.CHANNEL_URL, A.CHANNEL_TITLE, A.SORT_ORDER, A.REGISTER_ID, A.REGISTER_NAME, A.REGIST_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATER_NAME, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL A INNER JOIN IKEP4_RS_CATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID WHERE A.OWNER_ID = #ownerId#
A.CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId#
A.CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#
A.CHANNEL_ID <> #notInChannelId#
AND A.CHANNEL_TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
/* ===========================================END */
) AA WHERE RNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) TBL WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT /* [Channel_SqlMap.xml] countBySearchCondition */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL WHERE OWNER_ID = #ownerId#
CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#
CHANNEL_ID <> #notInChannelId#
AND CHANNEL_TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'

SELECT CHANNEL_ID, OWNER_ID, CHANNEL_URL, CHANNEL_TITLE, SORT_ORDER, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE FROM (SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT Row_number() OVER ( ORDER BY sort_order) AS RNUM, * FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL ) a ) TBL WHERE rnum = #sortOrder#
